'''Kitten''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* Baby {{EntityLink|Cat}}, tamable mobs that spawn in villages and swamp huts
* Baby {{EntityLink|Ocelot}}, passive mobs that reside in jungles
* Baby {{EntityLink|Rabbit}}, passive mobs that are found in many biomes
